description: Land parking next to the Camaron beach bar. Without services a few meters from the beach.

description: Mercadona Supermarket has a open  and very clean shower facilities inside disable toilets .

title_short: (21100) Punta Umbría - 10 Sector Estudio Detalle 2 Ed2

title: (21100) Punta Umbría - 8 Calle Campiña

title: (21100) Punta Umbría - 14 Avenida Sundheim

title: (21100) Punta Umbría - 3 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Quiet area near the road but with little traffic

title: (21100) Punta Umbría - 12 Avenida J. Clayton
description: Street with parking on both sides, it is a time zone from 10:30 to 19:30. Very quiet area to spend the night and with a bus stop next to it to get closer to the center of Punta Umbria. There are also small supermarkets and restaurants in the area. Going down the street there is a path that brings you closer to the town and borders the entire beach with access to it.

title: (21819) La Rábida - Carretera Huelva-Palos de la Frontera
title_short: (21819) La Rábida - Carretera Huelva-Palos de la Frontera
description: This is free open parking with free water fountain. Feels safe and recovered from wind in bad weather compare to staying next to the sea.

title: (21819) La Rábida - 110 Urbanizacion Rabida Urbanizacion
description: Parking right outside the door of the botanical garden. It is open until 21:00 and costs no entrance fee. Very clean toilet. Opens at 10:00 in the morning. The parking lot offers meadow, bushes, sheltered parking spaces. At night one or the other car driving by.

title: (21819) La Rábida - Carretera Palos Rábida
description: Pine area with lots of shade, near public toilets, very quiet area to spend the night several nights.

title: (21819) Palos de la Frontera - 107 Urbanizacion Rabida Urbanizacion
title_short: (21819) Palos de la Frontera - 107 Urbanizacion Rabida Urbanizacion
description: Very quiet place there is a retired man living perpetually in a caravan and the bar across the street are very nice, they have told me that the police sometimes pass but that they do not give a fine, it is only to ask for identification

title: (21819) La Rábida - 109 Urbanizacion Rabida Urbanizacion
description: Shaded ground, had a quiet night with our van

title: (21819) Palos de la Frontera - 105 Zona Residencial Santa María
title_short: (21819) Palos de la Frontera - 105 Zona Residencial Santa María
description: This place is at the end of the road right next to the nice gangplank in a roundabout. Me and 3 other cars spent the night there. You can come with a van and cars. It's too small for motorhomes. Amazing view when the sun goes down. All spaces are top row ;) Toilets on the hill. Weak Wifi from the shipmuseum

title: (21001) Huelva - Avenida Francisco Montenegro
description: Small quiet parking lot, with paved and level ground, next to a small beach, which has a drinking fountain, but no services. It has shade in the morning but not in the afternoon. There is a road relatively close but not too noisy. Overall nice for a stop to eat. I do not recommend to stay overnight.

title: (21819) La Rábida - 102 Urbanizacion Rabida Urbanizacion
description: Parking near the ships of Christopher Columbus. No prohibition sign. Quiet, but in the evening there are mosquitoes.

title: (21001) Huelva - 25D Avenida Francisco Montenegro
description: Small but trouble-free parking for AC up to 7.00 meters + 2 bikes, it is parked in parallel (there is a battery and in parallel), the problem is that if it is a weekend, a group of young people get together to spend the night. a lot of noise with music and cars. We left early (at 07:00 am) so as not to disturb those who park to go fishing. Observation: in front of that car park there are more places to park (even trailers park), we realized when we left.

title: (21810) La Rábida -
description: Bird view spot to a small but cozy lagoon. It's near a big road but you're well secluded, lonely, and no one can see you. It has a brick shed cut in half but in good condition (2022). Place to spend the night protected from rain and wind, and moderately cold.

title: () Huelva - Dique de Contención de Arenas Príncipe Juan Carlos I

title: (21001) Huelva - 22 Avenida Francisco Montenegro

title: (21001) Huelva - 1 Avenida Francisco Montenegro

description: Large parking lot, illuminated by the adjacent street and roundabout. Driveway to the parking lot directly at the roundabout. Solid sandy soil, right on a small, beautiful forest. Ideal if you are traveling with dogs. The car traffic is relatively loud, it didn't bother me, it gets calmer at midnight.

title: (21122) Aljaraque - 1 Solar Camping las Vegas
description:
It's still a bit close to de road, however you are surrounded by nature. the road is fine, just don't go to fast ;) 
this place is for Spanish standards clean,so please keep it clean.

title: (21005) Huelva - 1D Avenida de Diego Morón
description: Parking next to the hermitage of the Virgen de la Cinta. The passing of cars starts early. A short walk from the center.

title: (21130) Moguer - 12 Calle Laguna de Moguer
description: Good day parking, no problem. 15 minute walk to the beach, supermarket two minutes away.

title: (21007) Huelva - 11 Carretera Sevilla

title: (21120) Corrales - 2 Barrio Corrales Estación
description: Quiet parking close to sport centre, I spend here very quiet night. Garbage bins, free live music by birds in the morning!

title: (21110) Aljaraque - 83 Avenida-Alcalde Jose Conceglieri
description: Simple but larger parking lot next to a sports field. No services. Stood here one night without any problems. From 7 o'clock some traffic noise.

title: (21110) Aljaraque - 1 Carretera Huelva Punta Umbría
description: Large parking area in the municipality. Accessible. Wide, without services except wastebaskets. Good views, bar next door, shops, 100m from the center. Bike path to the nearby beach. No height or space limit. Important: ON WEDNESDAYS THERE IS A MARKET inside from 8am to 3pm

title: (21130) Moguer - 1 Avenida de Santa Clara
description: Quiet place to spend the night

title: (21130) Moguer - 1 Calle Ruiseñor

title_short: (21810) Palos de la Frontera - 153 Avenida Conquistadores
description: Along the Avenue it’s possible to park sideways and lengthways. Very nice beach, some public toilets but closed in April.

title: (21459) Cartaya -
description: Good area of pine trees with holes in the road access but close to services. We hear cars but they are not loud enough to disturb. Cool ringtones and cricket sounds!

title: (21459) Playa San Miguel -
description: Parking space right next to beach access. Also near beach cafe. A couple of other motor homes parked up.

title: (21459) Cartaya - A-5052
description: Place with underground access to the beach fit motorhomes and many shades

title: (21810) Palos de la Frontera - 168B Avenida Conquistadores
title_short: (21810) Palos de la Frontera - 168B Avenida Conquistadores
description: Small space X parking max two motorhomes small beach bar beautiful shower and water at the beginning of the street

name: Camping Playa de Mazagon
title: (21130) Camping Playa de Mazagon
description: Moguer, 19A Avenida Pintor Miguel Ballesta Maqueda. Camping Playa de Mazagon. C / Cuesta de la Barca, s / n, 21130 Mazagón, Huelva, Spain. With a converted van. Sandy pitches but sea view. In my opinion a bit expensive for the quality of the service. A large campsite on top of a cliff overlooking the beach and the entrance to the port of Huelva. Very sandy so we were asked to park on access roads which was fine out of season. I can't imagine how it would be if it was raining.....

title: (21800) Moguer - s/n Calle Inca
description: Parking next to a school, a children's park and very close to the center of Moguer, a short walk to visit and have tapas, for example in El Lobito. Very quiet area.

title: (21459) - 6 Urbanizacion Urverosa Playa E. D.
description: Beautiful place on the banks of the estuary, there is a height barrier, we have not spent the night, although if there were several vans, we have seen it walking

title: (21130) Palos de la Frontera - 53 Calle Pintor Miguel Ballesta
title_short: (21130) Palos de la Frontera - 53 Calle Pintor Miguel Ballesta
description:
Direct access to the beach, maybe 5 or 6 places. Some light from an upper street. Access road is hard terrain so no problem. Nearby a family bar, the owners live here.
No services at all. Mazagón the nearest village as a nice Supermarket with fresh fish in the morning and fresh bread is only 3 kms away. You also have a Camping Park 1km away.

title: (21130) Moguer - 53B Avenida Pintor Miguel Ballesta Maqueda
title_short: (21130) Moguer - 53B Avenida Pintor Miguel Ballesta Maqueda
description: We spent the night without any problem, you have the sunset right in front of you. Along the path (track) that leads to this point there are several entrances to the beach where there were more vans and AC. Be careful, the last few meters are sandy and you can get stuck.

title: (21130) Moguer - 1 Solar Camping Fontanilla Playa
description: Parking in the middle of nature next to the beach Poor internet in a number of places. Danger! Very high risk of getting stuck!!!

title: (21800) Moguer - 2A Calle la Parrala
description: Parking by day and we assume that also valid for the night, it is in the fairgrounds attached to the sports facilities and schools, very close to the museum house of Juan Ramón Jiménez, native of Moguer and Nobel Prize for literature, certainly a visit mandatory on your route through the province of Huelva.

title: (21007) Huelva - 19D Finca la Alquería
description: Service station with very clean public bathroom and shower for 2 euros and if you refuel free. It has a parking lot behind that in the morning gives the shade, perhaps a bit noisy in the morning but if you are one of those who wake up early you don't even notice. Very friendly and very attentive at the gas station a 10 for them

title: (21459) El Rompido - 53 Calle Luis Daoiz
description: Public free park with no services but near the village centre and beach. quiet area to rest. we spent 1 night. without problems

title: (21459) El Rompido - 2V Urbanización S a P U R-10
title_short: (21459) El Rompido - 2V Urbanización S a P U R-10
description: Public parking in El Rompido, very spacious, there is shade due to the large trees. Near the port and the leisure area (2 minutes). You can hear the traffic but nothing annoying. Arriving here as the port parking is full in summer.

address.street: 2V Urbanización S a P U R-10

title: (21007) Huelva - Calle del Jamon de Huelva
title_short: (21007) Huelva - Calle del Jamon de Huelva
description: Road bar, with showers. Friendly attention although the food leaves something to be desired. It is in a commercial area where you can find a Decathlon.

title: (21459) El Rompido - 1 Calle Longueron
description: You can park without restrictions

title: (21459) El Rompido - 12 Puerto de El Rompido
title_short: (21459) El Rompido - 12 Puerto de El Rompido
description: Parking at the port of Rompido (pier stones, next to the Pier FlechaMar). In the summer very complete. Calm

title: (21007) Huelva - 24 Solar PAU4 la Alqueria
description: Very large Decathlon car park, located in a polygon. Very quiet area, it has some wooden tables to eat.

title: (21007) Huelva - 20 Solar PAU4 la Alqueria
description: Nice place. Next to a park. There is a mechanic and a tire shop nearby.

title: (21110) Aljaraque - Unnamed Road
description: Nice rest area in the Pinienhein with playground, fire pits and picnic tables. You can hear a bit of the street otherwise but very peaceful.

title: (21130) Huelva - 359 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Very nice parking lot next to the National Parador. Picnic area with tables, barbecues and fountains. It is forbidden to camp. This place of nature is really very pleasant, do not miss a walk on the beach along the cliffs.

title: (21130) Mazagón - 358 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Day parking managed by the Junta de Andalucía near the beach of the Parador de Mazagón. it has tables and shades. there is a bar nearby.

title: (21610) San Juan del Puerto -
description: Muelle antiguo de San Juan del Puerto . Big recreation area with lots of space and facilities including barbecue . Acces for all types of campers though a 4km unpaved road in good condition . The entry for the road is a bit tricky as Google maps does not get it right . To enter the road uae the coordinates in the comments .

title: (21450) Cartaya -
description: Very quiet and peaceful place to rest  with superb views... road a bit bumpy ... place for a small camper

title: (21800) Moguer - 17 Poblado Forestal de Mazagón
description: Spectacular place! Quiet and with access to a natural beach trail. 10 min walk, easy. Few people, dogs are allowed for not being official access.

title: (21005) Huelva - 1 Diseminado Santa Ursula
description: Propane gas bottle at Repsol gas station. You can change Spanish bottled here.

title: (21450) Cartaya -
description: Quiet recreational area with tables and bbq installation. Slept like a baby. Pine trees for shade. Views and birdsong. Relativly flat. Several trails to choose from Wikiloc and Trailforks. Two roads in: take the one from A-5058. Last bit is a dirt road. Hard sand all the way but potholes in several places. No problem driving a 7m sprinter van. You do not need a 4x4. If you do not like dirtroad for your van: choose another place! Do not take the other road from the north. Its in very bad shape. This place is really clean: please keep it clean and do not leave any trash or toiletpaper visible when you leave! Thanx and enjoy❤️

title: (21820) Mazagón -
description: Quiet location with deer and nightjar singing. Also saw Iberian hare. All water is dried up at the moment unfortunately. Internet reception is not the best. A little bit further on the road and then to the left there is a little building and some space which will be easier for bigger vehicles. On the main road there is some trafic.

title: (21610) San Juan del Puerto - 1Z Barriada Celulosa
title_short: (21610) San Juan del Puerto - 1Z Barriada Celulosa
description: Esplanade next to the sports hall very wide and quite flat the night was quiet

title: (21800) Moguer - A-494
description: Very large free parking, 5 minutes from the beach. Fresh water between the BBQ places. Not allowed to stay overnight as it’s in a nature reserve.

title: (21450) Cartaya - 820 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Large public ground-level parking lot. Street next door, but not busy. We spent one night here without any problems.

title: (21610) San Juan del Puerto - 198 Calle Trigueros
title_short: (21610) San Juan del Puerto - 198 Calle Trigueros
description:
Ample and comfortable place to park,
It is quite flat, it is dirt, a bit noisy since it is next to a race that connects with the greenway of the water mills, a route to do by bicycle.

title: (21459) El Rompido -
description: In wild nature ! The road is a bit bumpy but doable. It is a nature reserve.

title: (21500) Gibraleón - Autopista del V Centenario

name: Camping Doñana Mazagón
title: (21820) Camping Doñana Mazagón
description: Very large campsite on a long sandy beach with a large swimming pool area. Out of season, all pitches cost the same price, otherwise the pitches under the pines and the partially concreted "CP" pitches for mobile homes are more expensive. All pitches with electricity (1200 W) and water. Some of the awnings are only 2.2 meters high and the terrain is partly sandy. Clear separation of the plots, partly with hedges. Evacuation of gray water at the old car wash in front of the entrance. All-you-can-eat lunch and dinner buffet. WLAN at all seats, access data available at reception (on request). swimming pool basin.

name: Camping Luz
title: (21430) Camping Luz
description: Campsite with some large pitches. Free WiFi throughout the campsite. Free sockets in the toilet building. Bathrooms and showers in modern sanitary building with adjustable temperature without having to press the button every now and then. The beach is a 15 minute walk from the campsite. No disposal option for vehicles with holding tank! Unsuitable for caravans with a height >3.0 m and/or >7.5 m length

name: Camping Playa Taray
title: (21430) Camping Playa Taray
description: Supply and disposal without overnight stay. Restaurant and mini market/bakery on the campsite. Very shady (eucalyptus). The subsoil is mostly solidified soil. The pitches are mostly large. The beach is about 200 meters across the access road and protected by a nature reserve with pine forest for the chameleon. It is a spectacular stretch of unspoilt sandy beach stretching for miles. Beach bar on the beach. WiFi available. Supermarket at 3.5 km.

title: (21430) Isla Cristina - A-5054
description: Parking with trees. Lots of shade, chiringuito close access to the beach with showers. Quiet place to sleep. Campsite in front with a supermarket. The site has picnic areas to eat.

name: The Kitefinca
title: (21430) The Kitefinca
description:
CLOSED

Parking at 'the KiteFinca': for campers up to 7.0m. There is a toilet and a hot outdoor shower.
The price is €15 for a motorhome. Each person over 5 years old costs €5
Dog/Cat is free, We have a dog.

Kitesurfing lessons are provided. Longboard (skate) and Stand Up Paddle (sup) lesson (or rental) is also possible.

Check in from 2:00 PM to 9:00 PM at the latest (note: preferably no check-in between 4:00 PM & 7:00 PM)
Check out until 12:00 at the latest

Please note we are an eco-friendly place.
Only use the biodegradable products offered! Be sparing with water! Recycle waste.
We have no point emptying your gray or black water!!!!)

address.street: Finca los Montesillo Camino del charco s/n

In the services you have to take the paper at the entrance, before sitting down, they do it to avoid wasting paper and there are fewer jams.

description: General parking for all vehicles that do not exceed 5-6 meters. They are located on the avenue parallel to the Niebla wall. Wide walking area with benches and gardens. There are garbage containers. We parked during the day and spent the night with no problems.

title: (21840) Niebla - 10 Travesia Tortillo Trasera
description: Esplanade of Albero super big, maybe fairground, surrounded by houses and vehicles, we spent a night without problems. Super quiet and safe site. In the very city of Niebla.

title: (21720) Rociana del Condado -
description: Private property of 7000 m2 in which we provide customers with pitches for motorhomes (5 maximum for the moment). We have provided a chillout area where customers can relax by the pool, sunbathe, access our small family bar where we organize karaoke on demand. Our finca is easily accessible and is located 4 km from the village of Rociana del Condado, 20 km from El Rocio and 20 minutes from the beaches of Mátalascaña. We want to provide maximum facilities to our visitors although we are in our infancy and we are working to ensure a family atmosphere. We speak French, Spanish and English. Welcome everyone.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 37 Avenida Carnaval de Isla Cristina
title_short: (21410) Isla Cristina - 37 Avenida Carnaval de Isla Cristina

title_short: (21410) Isla Cristina - 11 Urbanización Molino Carreras M14

title: (21840) Niebla - A-472
description: By van or car. Not accessible for motorhome. Next to the town of Niebla which is worth the detour. Lunch break: tree-lined corner on the banks of the Rio. No service, no trash but service station 200 m away. We did not stay for the night but it must be possible.

title: (21510) San Bartolomé de la Torre - H-9013
title_short: (21510) San Bartolomé de la Torre - H-9013

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 4 Calle Isla Mar
description: Parking space along the road. There is a bit of a car during the day but at night it is quieter. We spent a night without a problem, the police came by and it is ok. There is a charge for parking. At 300m you have access to the beach, there are beach showers so top. There is also a small bar to drink or eat tapas right in front of the sea. Very good spot.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 4 Calle D Pp.2

name: Camper Park Playas de Luz
title: (21420) Camper Park Playas de Luz
description:
CAMPER PARK BEACHES OF LIGHT | OPEN! Area for motorhomes with all kinds of service. Located in a privileged place due to its views of the marshes, flamingos and other birds. Next to the greenway you can walk to Isla Cristina and by bike to Ayamonte and Islantilla. Nearby there is a public transport stop, restaurants and all kinds of services. AVAILABILITY AND RESERVATIONS ON THE WEB.

Our prices are: €12/night. In May, June and September: €15/night pool included. July, August and Easter: €18/night pool included. Stays of only one night +2€. Our prices include two adults and two children, extra person €3/night. Full rate available at reception and on our website.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 4B Avenida de la Constitución
title_short: (21410) Isla Cristina - 4B Avenida de la Constitución
description: Esplanade where vehicles park both day and night. There are no services but it is a quiet area to spend the night. Curious anecdote to see a minivan with foreign registration in the center of the area with its particular recreation area. It must take time because it appears on Google maps.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 30 Muelle Martínez Catena
description: 24h parking on the banks of the Ría Carreras, at the foot of the pier Martínez Catena, uncrowded, except for vehicles that run in the street and are sometimes fast and noisy during the day, the night is quieter . Far sounds of the engines of boats going fishing. Area of the Sunsets Route and Isla Cristina. Just behind the car park is a very large stretch of sand delimited by a fence of gray blocks where it is also possible to park without any kind of inconvenience. Near the city center, yacht club and fishing port, spectacular views and sunsets on the Ría Carreras.
